text:
Hey folks!

Ever considered building a marketplace app on HubSpot?

On September 29 from 11AM-12PM EDT, we're hosting a HubSpot App Partner Program AMA, an opportunity to hear from HubSpot's VP of Platform Ecosystem, Scott Brinker, and Director of Product Development, Hugh Durkin, about the HubSpot App Partner Program. The program helps companies around the world grow their business through the HubSpot App Marketplace and exclusive distribution to our growing customer base. Definitely join us if you want to learn more!

Not sure where to post, but question about CTA’s: Seems if there is particular ad-blockers, it won’t render as html and outputs the image like it was an email. Any tips or tricks on this?

Not sure where the best place to post this.  Is there a way to copy a form from an client account to a test account?  I want to simulate the form and workflow in a test environment.  Do you have to recreate it in each?
